value.title: DAX Fridays! #115:  VALUE, WEEKNO, YEAR - Previous week dashboard on fiscal calendar

It is easier than you think, but if your weeks don't start on Sunday and you have a week number column that you need to sort using a fiscal calendar, then it gets a bit trickier
